plot: An overzealous student filmmaker sets out to make the best student film ever, for all the wrong reasons, in order to impress a girl that is way out if his league.
title: The Best Worst Student Film
plot_es: An overzealous student filmmaker sets out to make the best student film ever, for all the wrong reasons, in order to impress a girl that is way out if his league.
plot_en: An overzealous student filmmaker sets out to make the best student film ever, for all the wrong reasons, in order to impress a girl that is way out if his league.
